name: Quantum Mechanic
description:
Quantum Mechanic is a single-player 2D puzzle-platformer utilising quantum mechanics as the player’s main abilities.

This game was the winner of the EQUS quantum games competition. (https://equs.org/events/games)

The game begins with many quantum computers mysteriously breaking down, the scientists responsible for them decide to outsource the repair job and equip a mechanic with the tools necessary to get the job done.

Your abilities include:
Superposition - move around the level and stay in the same position simultaneously
Tunneling - move through thin obstacles like they aren't there
Entanglement - move multiple copies of the player at once
Wave-partical duality - become light and shoot around, going through transparent obstacles

The game includes a built-in level editor.
